about_the_game:
In the brutal Dead Ball Zone arena, the aim of the game is simple. Put the ball in the net. By catching. Shooting. And beating your opponents to a pulp. With the help of grenades, guns, chainsaws and pure physical power!

You're the manager of a team of Minor League psychos, and your job is to make it to the World Championship. Look for the winner within, baby! But be warned, in Dead Ball Zone, a veteran is a guy who's playing his second game.

All the best elements of football, hockey and soccer. All the worst parts of human nature. Dead Ball Zone is a whiplash fast 3D game featuring hard-hitting action and awesome light-sourced graphics.

  • Customize and train your players for throwing, catching, strength, speed, agility and mentality.

  • Over a dozen mauling power-moves -- punching, taunting, turbo-tackling, jumping.

  • Pulverizing power-ups including bombs, guns and chainsaws.

  • Injure opponents affecting their performance and causing them to miss games.

  • Single player tournament mode or deadly single/multiplayer quickplay.

  • 10 different Geosphere arenas including London, San Francisco, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Los Angeles, Amazonia, Paris, India, Thailand and Hawaii.

  • Multiple teams, skills, leagues and customizable features mean huge replayability.

name: Savage Arena: Dead Ball Zone

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Savage Arena: Dead Ball Zone

short_description: Savage Arena: Dead Ball Zone is a futuristic all-out action sports game, which seamlessly combines frenetic sporting action, brutal special moves, and quick draw weaponry to deliver addictive, balls-out arcade style gameplay.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
